## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G18290](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G18290)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SIP1;2, SIP1B</u>
- **Gene Name:** SMALL AND BASIC INTRINSIC PROTEIN 1B
- **Description:**   Aquaporin-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2146268
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
